title: Every 10th User gets 100% cashback on Mobile Recharge. Hurry!
details: One out of every 10 recharges will get a 100% cashback. Top up your phone with Rs. 100 or more, maximum cashback is limited to Rs. 100. This coupon Code along with a unique mobile number can be used Upto 5 times. Cashback will be credited within 24 hours of the transaction into user's Paytm wallet. Valid for all users on web and App Except Airtel.

title: All Users Alert - Rs 50 Cashback on Bill Payments
details: Verified on 9 Mar 2016. Use this Paytm promo and get Rs 50 Cashback on each transaction of minimum order value of Rs 1000 and above. This is Valid on Bill Payments and be used only 3 time per user. A number can be recharged only thrice using this campaign. Cash back will be credited within 24 hours of the transaction into the user’s account. This is Valid for All Old and New Users. This Post Paid Bill Payment Code is applicable Only on Web. Not Valid for Airtel Users. Recharge Now!!

title: Get Rs 50 Cashback On Adding Rs 500 Or More To Your Paytm Wallet
details: Add Rs 500 or more to your Paytm wallet today and get Rs 50 cashback. This is applicable Only for RuPay debit card transactions. This offer is valid for a short time only! The above code can be used 1 time and is valid on Paytm web, mobile app or wallet app transactions. This Cashback will be credited in your Paytm wallet within 24 to 48 hours of the loading.

details: Verified on 9 Mar 2016. Paytm recharge is Offering Rs 100 Cashback Broadband Bill payment of Rs 600 or more by Using the above Code. This can be used once per user. A number can be recharged only once using this code. This is is valid on all Broadband Bill payments. Cashback will be credited within 24 hours of the transaction into user's Paytm Wallet. This is Valid for New users (user has never paid landline bill before). This is Valid for first transaction of Broadband Bill payments. This is Valid on Web and App.

You can also send money to your friends, shop over 500 categories and save more on your purchase. Get your Paytm online Recharge done quickly.
